meaningMnemonic: This is the verb version of the kanji <kanji>fry</kanji>, so it means <vocabulary>to fry</vocabulary>, more specifically <vocabulary>to stir-fry</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to sauté</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: Since this word has okurigana (hiragana attached to the kanji) you know that it's probably going to be the kun'yomi reading. You learned this reading with the kanji, so you should be good to go!
